text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the GIGABYTE AERO 15-X9-9RT4K5MP 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The fan noise is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the GIGABYTE AERO 15-X9-9RT4K5MP 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

The GIGABYTE AERO 15-X9-9RT4K5MP 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the GIGABYTE AERO 15-X9-9RT4K5MP 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the GIGABYTE AERO 15-X9-9RT4K5MP 15.6" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i9 8th Gen 8950HK (2.90 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
